document.full_text: the video-games rating board plans to announce that the main evaluation of games will no longer be based on direct human judgment but on a detailed digital questionnaire designed to bestow an age-appropriate rating.
document.title: critic's notebook: busy job of judging video-game content to be ceded to machines
lines_and_colors: the video-games rating board plans to announce that the main evaluation of games will no longer be based on direct human judgment but on a detailed digital questionnaire designed to bestow an age-appropriate rating.
